devflow.title: Social Platform for Developers
devflow.description: A modern social platform for developers. Users can post, bookmark, like, and share content. GitHub login is supported, and users can follow each other to stay connected.

shiporbit.title: Shipping Platform Connecting Carriers and Shippers
shiporbit.description: ShipOrbit is a modern shipping platform that connects carriers with shippers. Shippers can post shipping requests, and carriers can offer their services.
